definition: to chop/to cut down/to throw sth at sb
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: During the night, somebody had cut the boat loose from its moorings.
sentences.chinese: 有人在夜間砍斷了泊船的纜繩。

sentences.english: Youth have been out of danger by the emergency, but his right hand was cut off tesujis, probably will be disabled.
sentences.chinese: 經急救少年已脫險，但右手手筋被砍斷，恐將殘廢。

sentences.english: How is the hammer of the whole earth cut asunder and broken!
sentences.chinese: 全地的大錘何竟砍斷破壞。

sentences.english: you shall cut off her hand. Show her no pity.
sentences.chinese: 就要砍斷婦人的手，眼不可顧惜她。

sentences.english: They plucked the long grass and nettles from the tombs, thinned the poor shrubs and roots .
sentences.chinese: 他們拔除了墳墓上的茂草和蕁麻，砍斷矮樹和根株。

sentences.english: He that sendeth a message by the hand of a fool cutteth off the feet, and drinketh damage.
sentences.chinese: 藉愚昧人手寄的，是砍斷自己的腳，自受損害。

sentences.english: So more and more trees are cut by them.
sentences.chinese: 那樣越來越多樹被他們砍斷。

sentences.english: They are tough and rubbery, hard to cut.
sentences.chinese: 它堅韌並富有彈性，很難砍斷。

sentences.english: With a sweep of his sword he cut through the rope.
sentences.chinese: 他用劍一揮把繩子砍斷了。

sentences.english: If a son strikes his father, his hands shall be hewn off.
sentences.chinese: 如果一個兒子膽敢襲擊他的父親，他的手將被砍斷。

sentences.english: Take out a meat cleaver and cut off their hand.
sentences.chinese: 拿起切肉刀，砍斷他們的手。

sentences.english: Like cutting off one's feet or drinking violence is the sending of a message by the hand of a fool.
sentences.chinese: 籍愚昧人手寄信的，是砍斷自己的腳，自受損害。

sentences.english: Then the robber, with a heavy axe, broke the chain that held the buoy.
sentences.chinese: 那強盜用一把大斧子砍斷了拴着漂標的鏈子。

sentences.english: So. But the hand was gone already.
With these words, he cut the net down on three sides.
sentences.chinese: 一邊說着，湯砍斷了三面網。

sentences.english: I was twenty days hacking and hewing at it at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 砍斷它的根部用了二十天。

definition: to swear while talking/to be foul-mouthed
to hate and resent/angry and full of grievances
to amuse oneself/to play with/to tease
lit. to punch and kick (idiom); to beat up/fig. determined to sort out a problem
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
variant of 漁網|渔网[yu2 wang3]
